dcterms:description: A domain consisting of 27 unique tasks where reinforcement learners are tasked with moving a cart back and forth to balance a pole for as long as possible. The tasks vary based on properties of the cart and pole, including mass and length.
dcterms:title: 27-task Cartpole MDP Domain

dcterms:description: A domain consisting of 18 unique tasks where reinforcement learners interact with an environment that contains an object of interest and has an unknown grid-world topology. The tasks vary based on reward, movement, and topology.
dcterms:title: 18-task POcman POMDP Domain
